nodes.text: Star Wars Insider 154 is the 132nd issue of Star Wars Insider magazine and the sixty-second published by Titan Magazines. It was released on December 9, 2014.

Following up Insider's 50 Greatest Things to Love from the Prequel Trilogy featured in Star Wars Insider #147, we've asked the great and the good to nominate their favorite things from Episodes IV-VI for Insider's 50 Greatest Reasons to Love from the Original Trilogy! We're also looking at the amazing costumes of the original trilogy, previewing the latest episodes of Star Wars Rebels, and discovering who's coming to Star Wars Celebration Anaheim, which is shaping up to being the biggest Star Wars convention to date! Plus: As it's the Holiday season, we'll be looking at what to get the Star Wars fan who has everything!
